text: In the actual film, Judy Hopps (Ginnifer Goodwin) has only 48 hours to crack her first case, so she turns to scam-artist fox Nick Wilde (Jason Bateman) for help. Their investigation takes them to the local DMV (Department of Mammal Vehicles), which is staffed entirely by sloths. (Disney)
title: SEE IT: ‘Zootopia’ DMV scene becomes a reality as sloths take over office in YouTube short

meta_data.description: Take a number and be seated, it’s going to take a while.
